p: Based on current treatment situation, the number of cured COVID-19 patients has largely increased in China, which suggests that TCM may be an effective option integrated with chemical drug therapy for the treatment of COVID-19. Due to an insufficiency of published large-sample clinical data from COVID-19 patients, the efficacy and side effects of current treatment require further exploration. It is therefore recommended to take and apply TCM prescription under the guidance of TCM practitioners.
